purpose: The email is to announce a postdoctoral position in Computer Science at Karlstad University focused on AI-supported digital health and human rights.
evidence_sentences: We are looking for a highly motivated postdoc researcher to work together with us in the KKS-funded project 'OPEHRA: Operationalisng Human Rights in the Design of AI-supported Digital Health'.

The Faculty of Health Science and Technology has an opening for a full-time post-doctoral research fellow in Computer Science with a focus on Impact and Risk Assessments, Artificial Intelligence, and Digital Health and Social Care Systems.
The postdoctoral fellow will conduct research together with business partners in the field of AI-based systems for digital health, with a focus on impact and risk assessments.
